name: ai-design-co-pilot
description: A Figma plugin that analyzes selected design components and generates metadata and suggested variants using Claude AI.

scripts.build: tsc --target ES2020 --lib ES2020,DOM figma.d.ts code.ts ui.ts
scripts.dev: tsc --target ES2020 --lib ES2020,DOM --watch figma.d.ts code.ts ui.ts
